name: cypress-poc
description: Forked from [mtlynch/hello-world-cypress](https://github.com/mtlynch/hello-world-cypress) that allows to run a project and its Cypress end-to-end tests using docker-compose. The initial setup is well described in ["End-to-End Testing Web Apps: The Painless Way."](https://mtlynch.io/painless-web-app-testing/).
